com.yworks.yfiles.view

Class GridVisualCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.view.GridVisualCreator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IVisualCreator

    public class GridVisualCreator
extends Object
implements IVisualCreator
    Renders a grid using various different styles.
    See Also:
    GridInfo, getGridStyle()

    • Constructor Detail

      • GridVisualCreator

        public GridVisualCreator()
        Initializes a new instance of the GridVisualCreator class.

        The spacing is initialized to 25 units.

      • GridVisualCreator

        public GridVisualCreator(double horizontalSpacing,
                         double verticalSpacing)
        Initializes a new instance of the GridVisualCreator class.

        This initializes the GridInfo field using the given values.

        Parameters:
        horizontalSpacing - The x spacing.
        verticalSpacing - The y spacing.

        Initializes a new instance of the GridVisualCreator class.
        Parameters:
        gridInfo - The grid info.

    • Method Detail

      • createVisual

        public final Node createVisual(IRenderContext context)
        Description copied from interface: IVisualCreator
        This method is called by the framework to create a Node that will be included into the IRenderContext.

        CanvasControl uses this interface through the ICanvasObjectDescriptor to populate the visual canvas object tree.

        Specified by:
        createVisual in interface IVisualCreator
        Parameters:
        context - The context that describes where the visual will be used.
        Returns:
        The visual to include in the canvas object visual tree. This may be null.
        See Also:
        IVisualCreator.updateVisual(IRenderContext, Node)

        See Also:

      • getVisibilityThreshold

        public final double getVisibilityThreshold()
        Gets the visibility threshold.

        This indicates the minimum distance in the view coordinate system between two grid points. If the distance becomes smaller, the grid will not be rendered. The default value is 20.0d.

        Returns:
        The visibility threshold.
        See Also:
        setVisibilityThreshold(double)

      • isVisible

        public final boolean isVisible()
        Gets a value indicating whether this GridVisualCreator is visible.
        Returns:
        true if visible; false otherwise.
        See Also:
        setVisible(boolean)

        public final void setVisibilityThreshold(double value)
        Sets the visibility threshold.

        Parameters:

        See Also:

        See Also:

      • updateVisual

        public final Node updateVisual(IRenderContext context,
                               Node oldVisual)
        Description copied from interface: IVisualCreator
        This method updates or replaces a previously created Node for inclusion in the IRenderContext.

        The CanvasControl uses this method to give implementations a chance to update an existing Visual that has previously been created by the same instance during a call to IVisualCreator.createVisual(IRenderContext). Implementation may update the oldVisual and return that same reference, or create a new visual and return the new instance or null.

        Specified by:
        updateVisual in interface IVisualCreator
        Parameters:
        context - The context that describes where the visual will be used in.
        oldVisual - The visual instance that had been returned the last time the IVisualCreator.createVisual(IRenderContext) method was called on this instance.
        Returns:
        oldVisual, if this instance modified the visual, or a new visual that should replace the existing one in the canvas object visual tree.
        See Also:
        IVisualCreator.createVisual(IRenderContext), ICanvasObjectDescriptor, CanvasControl
